ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:07:18 [Issue ID 4000-158920] urn:comicvine:4000-158920 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 16:57:54. [Issue ID 242098]
ComicInfo.Summary: The ages long war between the Vampire and Werewolf Nations has finally ended. During a bloody climactic battle, opposing leaders Lord Drakken and Armand Waering were both slain, leaving behind a new and younger generation of supernaturals to gorge a tenuous truce. However the cost of creating this peace was high for the WetWorks team. Dozer and Claymore were killed in action, leaving the squad with only five of its original members. In addition, their one trusted friend from the intelligence organization known as International Operations, Benjamin Santini, was forced to storm the Oval Office and pull a gun on the President of the United States to prevent him from nuking the city of Phoenix. As a result, the stage has been set for an all-new direction for this slite military combat team...
ComicInfo.Title: Sacraments Of Damnation, Part 4
